Translations.Text: Ni$ Nkeyyes tarwa n Adem. Nebbwi ten di lberr, di yill, N$at iten s wayen ilhan, Nesmenyaf iten, nezzeh, i waias seg wid i Nexleq
Ass ideg ara Nenced akw imdanen, s imveboen nnsen; win id tusa tezmamt is yeffus is, widak ad $oen tazmamt nnsen, ur pwadensen s tissegnit
win illan d ader$al di tagi, ad yili d ader$al di laxeot, ad izid di tuff$a n ubrid
S tidep, qoib i k hewwlen $ef wayen i k d Nweeea, a d tesnulfuv ayen nniven, mgal a£. D$a, a k rren d aebib
Lemmer ur k Ntebbet ara, qoib tmalev cwii $uosen
Yili ad ak Nesaaddi tudert akked tmeppant, berdayen, sinna, ur teppafev, mgal a£, w ara k isellken
Ih, qoib i k id srewlen si tmurt, a k id ssuff$en segs. Yili cwii kan ara d gwrin, deffir ek
D tannumi imazanen nne£, id Nuzen, uqbel ik. Ur teppafev ara abeddel, di laadda nne£
Bedd i teallit mi istu$la yiiij, alamma d tellis n yiv. Leqwoan, tafrara. Ih, Leqwoan, tafrara, isaa inagan
Aawez yis kra n yiv, d nnafila k, amar a k id Irr Mass ik, deg umkan i pcekkioen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ssekcem iyi, anekcum n tidep. Ssuffe$ iyi, tuff$a n tidep. Efk iyi, s$uoeK, adabu ipselliken
Ini: "tusa d tidep, $abent tkerkas. Ih, tikerkas ilaq ad $abent
Nesrusu d, si Leqwoan, ayen illan d eellu akked ueunu i lmumnin. I irennu, i imednas, siwa lexsaoa
Ma N$at amdan ad iwexxeo, ad iveooef iman is. Ma ieuza t wugur ad iayes
Ini: "yal yiwen ixeddem akken ipwali. Mass nnwen Yif akw akken i Issen anwa i ipwanhan kteo
Steqsan k id $ef ooue. Ini: "ooue si lameo n Mass iw. Drus kan n tmusni i wen ippunefken
Ma ihwa ya£, a Nekkes ayen i k Nweeea. D$a ur teppafev, mgal a£, awkil
siwa aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, lfevl iS, i kecc, izga meqqweo
Ini: "lemmer ad mlilen imdanen akked leonun, iwakken a d awin am Leqwoan agi, ur d ppawin i t icban, xas maawanen
Ni$ Nefka d i imdanen, di Leqwoan agi, si yal imedyaten. Tegwti n yimdanen ur b$in, siwa tijehli
Nnan: "ur k neppamen alamma tesfeggvev a$ d a$balu, si tmurt
ne$, tesaiv leonan n tezdayin akked tfeooant, ideg feggven isaffen
ne$, a d tesse$liv igenni d ifeulan, akken i $ tzuxxev; ne$, a d tasev s Oebbi akked lmalayek, zdat nne
Ne$ a ppesauv axxam imzewweq, ne$ a ppaliv s igenni. Ur neppamen, s walluy ik, alamma tessersev ane$ d tazmamt ara n$eo". Ini: "gedha s Mass iw! Day lli$ d ayen nniven, siwa d amdan amazan
I iiifen imdanen ur uminen, mi ten id tusa nnhaya, mara d inin kan: "Iuzen ed Oebbi amdan d amazan
Ini: "lemmer llint, di tmurt, lmalayek, teddunt di laman, yili Nessers asent ed, seg igenni, lmelk amazan
Ini: "Iqadd Mass iw d Anagi, gari yidwen. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali imdanen iS, Issen iten

Win Inha Oebbi, atan idda d ubrid. Wid Itlef, ur asen teppafev imawlan, war Neppa, d awez$i. A ten id Nefser ass n tnekra $ef udmawen nnsen, dre$len, gugmen, aaegen. Axxam nnsen d Loahennama. Mi tenqes tmes, ad asen Nernu ajajie
D wagi ay d aqeiii nnsen, imi nekoen issekniyen nne£, u nnan: "day mi nu$al d i$san, d a$webbao, a d nu$al di lxelq amaynut
